about_the_game:
In Imperium, you play as a Paladin either solo or as a team of 4, pitted against the hordes of a necromantic cult; you are tasked with defending various fortresses in a grand fantasy war. Arm yourself with spells, build wards to repel evil, and fight to the bitter end.

Experience Unrelenting action, with combat inspired by 90's shooters and Dungeon Crawling Classics.

  • Wield an arsenal of both magic and melee weapons simultaneously. Combine both to discover new combos and strategies.

  • Access new Potions, Cantrips, Spells and Melee Weapons during play.

  • Enchant your weapons to deliver even more radiant justice.

  • Drink potions to unlock bonuses for use during a run.

Explore a diverse, grimdark fantasy world, uncover secrets, and discover the truth behind the derelict fortresses you are sworn to protect.

  • A great war has erupted between the Imperium and a sect of radical necromancers bent on using forbidden reanimation magicks for commercial gain. Will you willingly purge the radicals, or seek to uncover the origins of this endless conflict?

  • Defend a variety of fortresses for the Imperium, with locales including mystical gravesites, enchanted libraries, dingy cellars, sacrificial chapels, and more.

  • Handcrafted levels with procedural placement of items keep the levels feeling fresh while still expertly crafted.

Upgrade your character and arsenal as you progress through the rounds. Unlock new spells and master unique abilities.

  • Unlock a huge arsenal of weapons during play.

  • Discover a variety of enchantments, potions, spells, and melee weapons.

  • Mix and match different potion effects and weapons to cater to your specific playstyle, feel like attempting a mace only run? or a bombardia cantrip run? you can!

Key Features

  • Spellcasting Fantasy: Feel like a powerful wizard or a ruthless paladin, gain strength in each play session but slowly master each spell's mechanics with every new run.

  • Varied Combat: Invest in the playstyle you prefer. Choose between swords, axes, maces and a plethora of spells and upgrade them during gameplay.

  • Additional Objectives: Complete optional objectives and discover secrets in various levels.

  • High-Level Gameplay: A round-based horde mode where you survive in diverse environments.

  • Progression: Use souls earned during gameplay to purchase upgrades and new weapons.

  • Enemy Variety: Various enemies will appear in different rounds, each with unique movesets that require different combat approaches.

short_description: A medieval fantasy, round-based horde mode FPS. Become a Paladin solo or with up to 3 friends, wield swords and spells to purge an endless onslaught of reanimated horrors. Perform rituals, unlock spells and melee weapons, and uncover the truth behind the enchanted fortress you are sworn to protect.
